plays.text: Goal scored by Teemu Selanne unassisted
Penalty to Marco Sturm 2 minutes for High Sticking Craig Conroy
Penalty to JEFF JILLSON 2 minutes for Crosschecking Scott Nichol
Goal scored by Toni Lydman assisted by Marc Savard and Igor Kravchuk
Penalty to Jarome Iginla 2 minutes for Tripping Brad Stuart
Penalty to Owen Nolan 2 minutes for Slashing Bob Boughner
Penalty to Bob Boughner 2 minutes for Slashing Owen Nolan
Penalty to Craig Conroy 2 minutes for Elbowing Marco Sturm
Goal scored by Craig Conroy assisted by JAMIE ALLISON and Jarome Iginla
Penalty to Chris Clark 2 minutes for Holding Owen Nolan
Goal scored by Niklas Sundstrom assisted by Scott Thornton and Marcus Ragnarsson
Penalty to Jeff Cowan 2 minutes for Roughing Matt Bradley
Penalty to Scott Hannan 2 minutes for Holding Craig Conroy
Penalty to Marc Savard 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Evgeni Nabokov
